channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jeffrey R. Holland, next in line to lead Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, dies at 85
item.description: Holland died early Saturday morning from complications associated with kidney disease, the church announced on its website.

item.title: Bolsonaro undergoes medical procedure to treat severe hiccups
item.description: Bolsonaro is currently in prison after being convicted by the Supreme Court of attempting to carry out a coup following his electoral defeat in 2022.

item.title: Delta Just Published a 300-Page Coffee Table Book as a Thank-You to Its People
item.description: It’s a book of history, told through the stories of Delta’s employees over the past 100 years.

item.title: Delta’s AI Concierge Is Trying to Fix the Worst Thing About Travel. It Just Might Work
item.description: Delta has a bold plan to eliminate the uncertainty of travel using AI.

item.title: Emotionally Intelligent People Use 1 Word to Get More Done With Less Stress
item.description: Want to increase your productivity while lowering stress and anxiety? Try using a sprint.

item.title: GE HealthCare CEO Peter Arduini is forging a new chapter for the $20 billion-a-year business while drawing on Jack Welch’s legacy

item.title: 12 Objects That Tell the Story of a Wild Year

item.title: Brutal year for stock picking spurs trillion-dollar fund exodus
item.description: Around $1 trillion was pulled from active equity mutual funds over the year, according to estimates from Bloomberg Intelligence using ICI data.

item.title: How to Get Product Leadership Right
item.description: Organizations need product leaders, but they don’t know what to look for. Let’s change that.
